name: P'tite Maus
description:
The game is called "P'tite Maus" . 

It' a little prototype that was created during my training programm in Gamagora (Lyon). 

The goal is to learn the basis of the Unity software.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  • How to play ?

Use arrows to move the mouse.

If you want, use the buttons "a" and "e" to rotate the camera.

Your mission is to collect the cheese ! 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  • Is the screen too small ? 

Enlarge your screen with this button to play :  

Click on the screen to begin to play with the arrows.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Thank you for playing =) !
